ConsumerBaseFoundation.stf_description: Hubungi Agensi Pelancongan Pakar Aussie kami sekarang untuk menempah tiket penerbangan, penginapan dan lain-lain. Pakar dilatih oleh Tourism Australia.
ConsumerBaseFoundation.stf_keywords: travel specialist, travel agent, aussie specialist, australian experiences, planning, tourism australia, travel, adventure, pack, prepare, plan, book, booking, reservation, information
ConsumerBaseFoundation.txt_Teaser: An Aussie Specialist has the experience to help you plan and book every detail of your Australian vacation.

TopCategoryHighlights.stf_Heading: Cari Pakar Pelancongan Di Tempat Anda
TopCategoryHighlights.stf_InformationTitle: Siapakah Aussie Specialists atau Pakar Aussie?
TopCategoryHighlights.txt_Information:
Terdapat ribuan pengalaman Australia yang hebat yang anda boleh pilih. Ada kemungkinan, Agensi Pelancongan Pakar Aussie anda telah alami atau merancangnya sebelum ini.

Pakar mengenai segala-galanya yang berkaitan dengan Australia, para pakar ini telah menerima latihan yang meluas daripada Tourism Australia dan sebahagian besarnya telah pun mengembara di seluruh Australia. Mereka mempunyai pengalaman untuk membantu anda merancang dan menempah pengembaraan Aussie anda. Mereka tahu apa yang perlu dikemas dan dibawa, bagaimana keadaan cuaca di sana dan bagaimana caranya untuk menyertai penduduk setempat.

Jadi, jika anda masih tertanya-tanya bagaimana rasanya berlayar di Sydney Harbour, kehangatan pedalaman Australia, atau menyelam di Terumbu Sawar Besar, hubungi Pakar Aussie dan tidak lama lagi anda juga akan turut menikmati pengalaman Australia anda sendiri.

TopCategoryHighlights.stf_Heading: Find a travel specialist near you
TopCategoryHighlights.txt_Information:
There are thousands of great Australian experiences to choose from. Chances are, your Aussie Specialist Travel Agent has experienced or planned for them before.

Experts on everything Australian, these specialists receive extensive training from Tourism Australia and most have traveled throughout Australia. They have the experience to help you plan and book your Aussie adventure. They know what to pack, what the weather will be like and how to join in with the locals.

So, if you are wondering what it’s like to sail on Sydney Harbour, feel the warmth of the Australian outback, or dive on the Great Barrier Reef, contact an Aussie Specialist and you’ll soon be enjoying your very own Australian experience.
